boundary="----_=_NextPart_001_01C77585.CFCBB022" Date: Mon, 2 Apr 2007 17:19:58 -0700 Message-ID: X-MS-Has-Attach: X-MS-TNEF-Correlator: Thread-Topic: movies.tubezoom.com Thread-Index: AcdqQYz3PC4AFHuvRbCHskKgR2NK/wAAR0DwAAIzJfAAABwfYALOTnAQ X-Priority: 1 Priority: Urgent Importance: high References: From: "Bentkover, Michael" To: X-OriginalArrivalTime: 03 Apr 2007 00:19:58.0101 (UTC) FILETIME=[CFD0B450:01C77585] X-Spam-Level: / X-Spam-Score: 0.6 Cc: "Brandon, Marc" Subject: [ADMINS] movies.tubezoom.com X-BeenThere: planetadmins@lists.theplanet.com X-Mailman-Version: 2.1.7 Precedence: list List-Id: The Planet Admins list List-Unsubscribe: , List-Archive: List-Post: List-Help: List-Subscribe: , Sender: planetadmins-bounces@lists.theplanet.com Errors-To: planetadmins-bounces@lists.theplanet.com (multipart/alternative) Multipart prefix (text/plain) This is a multi-part message in MIME format. MIME element (text/plain) ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc. TPCM 1333 North Stemmons Freeway Suite 110 Dallas, TX. 75207 VIA ELECTRONIC MAIL RE: Unauthorized Use of Warner Bros.' Property Dear TPCM, I, the undersigned, CERTIFY UNDER PENALTY OF PERJURY that I am the owner or an agent authorized to act on behalf of the owner of certain intellectual property rights, said owner being named Warner Bros. Entertainment Inc. ("Warner Bros."). Warner Bros. is the owner of trademark, copyright, distribution and/or other intellectual property rights in and to the motion pictures entitled 300, Batman Begins, Blood Diamond, Charlie and the Chocolate Factory, Happy Feet, Miss Congeniality 2, The Departed, The Good German, and TMNT. Because of these rights, no one is authorized to manufacture, distribute, copy, sell and/or offer for sale products utilizing the 300, Batman Begins, Blood Diamond, Charlie and the Chocolate Factory, Happy Feet, Miss Congeniality 2, The Departed, The Good German, and TMNT Properties without the express written permission of Warner Bros. It has recently come to our attention that the website located at: http://movies.tubezoom.com/ is offering content from the 300, Batman Begins, Blood Diamond, Charlie and the Chocolate Factory, Happy Feet, Miss Congeniality 2, The Departed, The Good German, and TMNT Properties. I have a good faith belief that such content is not authorized by Warner Bros., its agent, or the law and therefore infringe Warner Bros.' rights. Therefore, please act expeditiously to remove or disable access to the above-referenced website. I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed. Please confirm that you have taken the appropriate action at your earliest convenience. Thank you for your prompt attention to this matter and please advise should you have any questions or require any additional information. This letter is not a complete statement of Warner Bros.' rights in connection with this matter, and nothing contained herein constitutes an express or implied waiver of any rights, remedies, or defenses of Warner Bros. in connection with this matter, all of which are expressly reserved. Sincerely, /mb Michael Bentkover Manager, Anti-Piracy Internet Operations, Forensics Warner Bros. Entertainment Inc. 4000 Warner Boulevard Bridge Building 156 South, #5109 Burbank, California 91522 Phone: (818) 954-3639 Fax: (818) 954-7898 michael.bentkover@warnerbros.com MIME element (text/html)
ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc.
TPCM
1333 North Stemmons Freeway
Suite 110
Dallas, TX. 75207
 
VIA ELECTRONIC MAIL

RE:   Unauthorized Use of Warner Bros.’ Property
 
Dear TPCM,
I, the undersigned, CERTIFY UNDER PENALTY OF PERJURY that I am the owner or an agent authorized to act on behalf of the owner of certain intellectual property rights, said owner being named Warner Bros. Entertainment Inc. ("Warner Bros.").
 
Warner Bros. is the owner of trademark, copyright, distribution and/or other intellectual property rights in and to the motion pictures entitled 300, Batman Begins, Blood Diamond, Charlie and the Chocolate Factory, Happy Feet, Miss Congeniality 2, The Departed, The Good German, and TMNT. Because of these rights, no one is authorized to manufacture, distribute, copy, sell and/or offer for sale products utilizing the 300, Batman Begins, Blood Diamond, Charlie and the Chocolate Factory, Happy Feet, Miss Congeniality 2, The Departed, The Good German, and TMNT Properties without the express written permission of Warner Bros.
 
It has recently come to our attention that the website located at: 
http://movies.tubezoom.com/
 
is offering content from the 300, Batman Begins, Blood Diamond, Charlie and the Chocolate Factory, Happy Feet, Miss Congeniality 2, The Departed, The Good German, and TMNT Properties.  I have a good faith belief that such content is not authorized by Warner Bros., its agent, or the law and therefore infringe Warner Bros.’ rights.  Therefore, please act expeditiously to remove or disable access to the above-referenced website.
 
I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.
 
Please confirm that you have taken the appropriate action at your earliest convenience.  Thank you for your prompt attention to this matter and please advise should you have any questions or require any additional information.
 
This letter is not a complete statement of Warner Bros.’ rights in connection with this matter, and nothing contained herein constitutes an express or implied waiver of any rights, remedies, or defenses of Warner Bros. in connection with this matter, all of which are expressly reserved.
 

Sincerely,
 
/mb
 

Michael Bentkover
